thread.section_title: Superior Van and Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Superior Van and Mobility | www.superiorvan.com
thread.title: John Unger
thread.title_full: Superior Van and Mobility reviewed by John Unger

author: John Unger
title: John Unger
text: Bryce Schultz is our go to person for our bus repairs. He does a great job. Most times when we call we talk straight to him. If he is busy he returns our calls quickly. Superior helps us out with our bus lift problems. I would give Bryce and the staff 5 stars.
